title: 'Yep, totally my bad': Ohio teen admits to causing crash that killed 5, forced 500 to evacuate
content: A 17-year-old girl from Ohio confessed to causing a deadly crash involving a tanker truck carrying toxic ammonia in Illinois. The incident led to five fatalities and the evacuation of over 500 people. Dashcam footage confirmed she cut off the tanker while speeding, causing the catastrophic accident.
summary: A 17-year-old girl from Ohio confessed to causing a deadly crash involving a tanker truck carrying toxic ammonia in Illinois. The incident led to five fatalities and the evacuation of over 500 people. Dashcam footage confirmed she cut off the tanker while speeding, causing the catastrophic accident.

title: Flight slams brakes mid-takeoff to avoid collision with crossing plane: 'Stopped so quickly'
content: A London-bound Norse Atlantic Airways flight from JFK Airport aborted takeoff to avoid a collision with another plane, reaching 87 knots before braking. The incident, described as minor by the airline, caused a slight delay but no panic among passengers. The flight safely landed in London six hours later without further issues.
summary: A London-bound Norse Atlantic Airways flight from JFK Airport aborted takeoff to avoid a collision with another plane, reaching 87 knots before braking. The incident, described as minor by the airline, caused a slight delay but no panic among passengers. The flight safely landed in London six hours later without further issues.

title: Trump promotes fake JPMorgan CEO's endorsement, then denies involvement: 'I don't know'
content: Former President Trump faced backlash after promoting a false endorsement from JPMorgan Chase CEO Jamie Dimon on Truth Social. JPMorgan's spokesperson quickly denied Dimon's support for Trump, and Dimon has confirmed his neutrality in the election. Trump claimed ignorance about the misleading post.
summary: Former President Trump faced backlash after promoting a false endorsement from JPMorgan Chase CEO Jamie Dimon on Truth Social. JPMorgan's spokesperson quickly denied Dimon's support for Trump, and Dimon has confirmed his neutrality in the election. Trump claimed ignorance about the misleading post.

title: Trump says Israel should 'hit Iran's nuclear facilities first' days after Biden urges restraint
content: Donald Trump urged Israel to strike Iran's nuclear facilities after a missile attack, criticizing Joe Biden's restraint. Trump advocated for an aggressive response, while Biden emphasized proportional retaliation to avoid escalating conflict. Israeli Prime Minister Netanyahu is evaluating potential responses, including symbolic or direct actions.
summary: Donald Trump urged Israel to strike Iran's nuclear facilities after a missile attack, criticizing Joe Biden's restraint. Trump advocated for an aggressive response, while Biden emphasized proportional retaliation to avoid escalating conflict. Israeli Prime Minister Netanyahu is evaluating potential responses, including symbolic or direct actions.

title: Family of 4 among 18 people killed in Israeli air strike on West Bank: Report
content: An Israeli air strike in Tulkarm, West Bank, killed at least 18 people, including civilians and local leaders of Hamas and Palestinian Islamic Jihad. The attack targeted Hamas leader accused of organizing attacks and supplying weapons. Rescue efforts continue amidst the devastation, with residents searching for missing loved ones.
summary: An Israeli air strike in Tulkarm, West Bank, killed at least 18 people, including civilians and local leaders of Hamas and Palestinian Islamic Jihad. The attack targeted Hamas leader accused of organizing attacks and supplying weapons. Rescue efforts continue amidst the devastation, with residents searching for missing loved ones.

title: Haiti reeling after 70 killed in gang attack
content: Specialist anti-gang police units have been deployed by Haiti's government following a massacre in Pont Sonde, northwest of Port-au-Prince, resulting in at least 70 deaths and extensive property damage. Gran Grif gang members used automatic rifles, killing many, including women and infants, prompting urgent state action.
summary: Specialist anti-gang police units have been deployed by Haiti's government following a massacre in Pont Sonde, northwest of Port-au-Prince, resulting in at least 70 deaths and extensive property damage. Gran Grif gang members used automatic rifles, killing many, including women and infants, prompting urgent state action.

title: ‘No one will vote for her’: Kamala Harris faces challenges in gaining back Arab American and Muslim support
content: US vice president Kamala Harris is scheduled to meet with Arab American and Muslim leaders in Flint, Michigan, in a bid to regain voter support amidst disappointment over US backing of Israel's actions in Gaza and Lebanon ahead of the 2024 presidential race.
summary: US vice president Kamala Harris is scheduled to meet with Arab American and Muslim leaders in Flint, Michigan, in a bid to regain voter support amidst disappointment over US backing of Israel's actions in Gaza and Lebanon ahead of the 2024 presidential race.

title: 'He’s having 48 hours with Diddy’: Sean Combs' questionable remarks on spending time with 16-year-old Justin Bieber
content: A 2011 clip of Justin Bieber and Sean 'Diddy' Combs on 'Jimmy Kimmel Live!' has resurfaced amid Diddy's arrest for alleged sex trafficking and racketeering. The video, showing their friendship, includes unsettling exchanges. Bieber, now focusing on his new role as a father, is aware of the allegations but chooses not to dwell on them.
summary: A 2011 clip of Justin Bieber and Sean 'Diddy' Combs on 'Jimmy Kimmel Live!' has resurfaced amid Diddy's arrest for alleged sex trafficking and racketeering. The video, showing their friendship, includes unsettling exchanges. Bieber, now focusing on his new role as a father, is aware of the allegations but chooses not to dwell on them.

title: 'Free and fair' election may not be 'peaceful', says Biden during first White House briefing
content: US President Joe Biden expressed concerns over potential unrest in the upcoming election, citing former President Trump's previous dangerous statements and Ohio Sen. JD Vance's refusal to accept past results. This came during Biden's rare appearance in the White House briefing room, where he also addressed media issues.
summary: US President Joe Biden expressed concerns over potential unrest in the upcoming election, citing former President Trump's previous dangerous statements and Ohio Sen. JD Vance's refusal to accept past results. This came during Biden's rare appearance in the White House briefing room, where he also addressed media issues.

title: Will not allow anti-India acts on our soil: Sri Lanka president
content: Sri Lankan President Dissanayake assured India's foreign minister, S Jaishankar, that Sri Lanka will not allow its territory to threaten India's security. They emphasized the intertwined security and economic interests of both nations. Dissanayake highlighted renewable energy exports and tourism potentials. India pledged $61.5 million for port modernization and promised development assistance, including 22 locomotives for Sri Lankan railways.
summary: Sri Lankan President Dissanayake assured India's foreign minister, S Jaishankar, that Sri Lanka will not allow its territory to threaten India's security. They emphasized the intertwined security and economic interests of both nations. Dissanayake highlighted renewable energy exports and tourism potentials. India pledged $61.5 million for port modernization and promised development assistance, including 22 locomotives for Sri Lankan railways.

title: Special Counsel Jack Smith 'bending rules' to damage Trump’s campaign, says CNN analyst
content: CNN senior legal analyst Elie Honig criticises Special Counsel Jack Smith for bending legal procedures to undermine Donald Trump’s electoral chances, citing a recent court filing exceeding typical length and procedural irregularities intended to weaken Trump's position ahead of the election.
summary: CNN senior legal analyst Elie Honig criticises Special Counsel Jack Smith for bending legal procedures to undermine Donald Trump’s electoral chances, citing a recent court filing exceeding typical length and procedural irregularities intended to weaken Trump's position ahead of the election.

title: Dalrymple criticises British Musuem exhibition 'Silk Roads' for ‘excluding’ India
content: Historian William Dalrymple criticizes the British Museum's 'Silk Roads' exhibition for excluding India, highlighting its pivotal role in ancient East-West trade. While acknowledging India's contributions, the exhibition omits significant Indian trade and cultural sites, leading to an incomplete portrayal of historical trade networks.
summary: Historian William Dalrymple criticizes the British Museum's 'Silk Roads' exhibition for excluding India, highlighting its pivotal role in ancient East-West trade. While acknowledging India's contributions, the exhibition omits significant Indian trade and cultural sites, leading to an incomplete portrayal of historical trade networks.

title: Mobile, internet services suspended in Islamabad, Rawalpindi amid PTI protest
content: Authorities halted life in Islamabad and Rawalpindi by cutting off mobile and internet services, sealing entry points, and deploying security forces to prevent a PTI protest led by Imran Khan. Section 144 was enforced, and multiple arrests were made. Khan urged supporters to protest a constitutional amendment restricting judicial independence, highlighting the battle for 'true freedom.'
summary: Authorities halted life in Islamabad and Rawalpindi by cutting off mobile and internet services, sealing entry points, and deploying security forces to prevent a PTI protest led by Imran Khan. Section 144 was enforced, and multiple arrests were made. Khan urged supporters to protest a constitutional amendment restricting judicial independence, highlighting the battle for 'true freedom.'

title: Health officials issue allergy alert as wasps thrive during Hurricane Helene
content: In the aftermath of Hurricane Helene, health officials are addressing a surge in wasp stings due to disturbed nests. Floodwaters have led to increased stinging incidents, prompting efforts to stock up on allergy medications like Benadryl and EpiPens. President Joe Biden has pledged federal support for recovery as affected regions grapple with the hurricane's devastation.
summary: In the aftermath of Hurricane Helene, health officials are addressing a surge in wasp stings due to disturbed nests. Floodwaters have led to increased stinging incidents, prompting efforts to stock up on allergy medications like Benadryl and EpiPens. President Joe Biden has pledged federal support for recovery as affected regions grapple with the hurricane's devastation.

title: Ex-adult star claims she saw Donald Trump, Diana Ross at Diddy parties
content: Former adult star Adria Sheri English alleges in a lawsuit that Diddy forced her into sexual activities during his 'freak-offs.' She claims multiple celebrities including Donald Trump, Diana Ross, and Reverend Al Sharpton attended these events, though the freak-offs were separate from the main parties. Diddy gained financial benefits from coercing people like English to sleep with his high-profile guests.
summary: Former adult star Adria Sheri English alleges in a lawsuit that Diddy forced her into sexual activities during his 'freak-offs.' She claims multiple celebrities including Donald Trump, Diana Ross, and Reverend Al Sharpton attended these events, though the freak-offs were separate from the main parties. Diddy gained financial benefits from coercing people like English to sleep with his high-profile guests.

title: Marjorie Taylor Greene says 'they can control the weather' after Hurricane Helene's devastation
content: Marjorie Taylor Greene caused uproar by claiming on social media that 'they' can control the weather amid Hurricane Helene's devastation. Her statement has attracted criticism. "Yes they can control the weather. It's ridiculous for anyone to lie and say it can't be done," she wrote puzzling social media users about who are they. Meanwhile, Helene, a Category 4 hurricane, wreaked havoc across the southeastern US, resulting in 215 deaths and widespread destruction in multiple states.
summary: Marjorie Taylor Greene caused uproar by claiming on social media that 'they' can control the weather amid Hurricane Helene's devastation. Her statement has attracted criticism. "Yes they can control the weather. It's ridiculous for anyone to lie and say it can't be done," she wrote puzzling social media users about who are they. Meanwhile, Helene, a Category 4 hurricane, wreaked havoc across the southeastern US, resulting in 215 deaths and widespread destruction in multiple states.

title: Trump joins forces with Brian Kemp after previously calling him a 'bad guy' amid Hurricane Helene recovery
content: Former US President Donald Trump and Georgia governor Brian Kemp will make a rare joint appearance amidst Hurricane Helene's aftermath, assessing storm damage in Evans, Georgia. Their strained relationship since the 2020 election underscores the meeting. Trump and Kemp have criticized the federal response to the disaster, highlighting Georgia's crucial role in the upcoming 2024 election.
summary: Former US President Donald Trump and Georgia governor Brian Kemp will make a rare joint appearance amidst Hurricane Helene's aftermath, assessing storm damage in Evans, Georgia. Their strained relationship since the 2020 election underscores the meeting. Trump and Kemp have criticized the federal response to the disaster, highlighting Georgia's crucial role in the upcoming 2024 election.

title: Trump made fun of widow of man killed at Butler rally in leaked audio: 'At least four couples...'
content: ​“So they’re going to get millions of dollars but the woman, the wife, this beautiful woman, I handed her the cheque – we handed her the cheque – and she said, ‘This is so nice, and I appreciate it, but I’d much rather have my husband.’ Now, I know some of the women in this room wouldn’t say the same," Donald Trump said about the wife of the man who was killed during the first assassination attempt on Trump in Pennsylvania.
summary: ​“So they’re going to get millions of dollars but the woman, the wife, this beautiful woman, I handed her the cheque – we handed her the cheque – and she said, ‘This is so nice, and I appreciate it, but I’d much rather have my husband.’ Now, I know some of the women in this room wouldn’t say the same," Donald Trump said about the wife of the man who was killed during the first assassination attempt on Trump in Pennsylvania.

title: 254,000 jobs added in September as US economic growth holds steady: Report
content: The US economy experienced significant job growth last month, adding 254,000 jobs and reducing the unemployment rate to 4.1%. Despite a slowdown in the hiring rate and worker confidence, wage growth remains strong, making further substantial rate cuts from the Federal Reserve unlikely.
summary: The US economy experienced significant job growth last month, adding 254,000 jobs and reducing the unemployment rate to 4.1%. Despite a slowdown in the hiring rate and worker confidence, wage growth remains strong, making further substantial rate cuts from the Federal Reserve unlikely.

title: Trump impeachment witness shocks MSNBC, declares support for former President in 2024
content: Gordon Sondland, key witness in Trump’s first impeachment, surprisingly supports Trump for the 2024 presidential race, citing dissatisfaction with Biden’s governance. Initially distancing himself post-Capitol riot, Sondland now argues Biden’s policies pose a greater threat. His support contrasts with former Trump aide Sarah Matthews, who backs Kamala Harris, highlighting policy versus democracy concerns.
summary: Gordon Sondland, key witness in Trump’s first impeachment, surprisingly supports Trump for the 2024 presidential race, citing dissatisfaction with Biden’s governance. Initially distancing himself post-Capitol riot, Sondland now argues Biden’s policies pose a greater threat. His support contrasts with former Trump aide Sarah Matthews, who backs Kamala Harris, highlighting policy versus democracy concerns.
